Loading necessary libraries:

```{r libraries}
library(ggplot2)

```

# CORE ELEMENTS

Core elements: creating an empty Shiny App

```{r coreElements}
ui <- fluidPage()
server <- function(input, output){}
shinyApp(ui, server)
# Can be created in one document app.R like this OR
# write a ui.R and a server.R separately
# Notice: fluidPage initiates an html webpage
# Notice: The server component will be a function that takes input and 
# output arguments. These will be lists of objects defined in the ui section.
# Notice: Running this code alone creates an html product. Click on open in 
# browser and then right click anywhere in the empty page to see the generated 
# html code
```
